channel.title: Blue screen and white menu
channel.description: Hi. I've just recently gotten black mesa and a huge fan of the original HL. When i start the game the menu is white, And when i get shot and in the chapter blast pit (One of my fav original chapters) when i drive the old transit system and crashes i fall into the radiation pit the screen goes blue. PLZZZZ help.
